title: Anyone else has this problem?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I have a problem, and I don't know if other people are having this trouble too, but I try to log in to League on the NA server and it's stuck on the login screen saying "Logging On" and it will stay there for a while, and never log on to the game at all. Someone please help me with this problem, thank you.

replies.body:
When this happens, it usually means that your client cannot properly reach the login servers. I suggest checking out our [Login Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) for some of the most frequent fixes for this.

Let me know if that resolved your issue.
